channel.title: Baseball on Rod Schmidt
channel.description: Recent content in Baseball on Rod Schmidt

item.title: St. Louis Cardinals, My Penultimate Baseball Stadium?
item.description: Busch Stadium I finally went to another baseball game in my goal to see every MLB team at their home stadium. This time I went to St. Louis to see the Cardinals. I call this my penultimate stadium because just Pittsburgh is left after this one. More on that later. Here’s the box score: Box Score Click here to see a rundown of the game. The Cardinals lost to the Milwaukee Brewers, 8-2.
